title: Interpretation of lightning in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: In the following article, the Encyclopedia presents to you the interpretation of lightning in a dream for a single woman, which is one of the natural visual phenomena that when it occurs takes the form of a large electrical spark in the sky. Thunder roared in terror. An unmarried woman may see lightning during her sleep and wake up frightened, and would like to find an explanation for what she saw in a dream, because it may carry for her a message from God Almighty related to something in her life and whether the connotation is good or not. This topic, including Ibn Sirin and Al-Usaimi, we present to you the following paragraphs. Interpretation of lightning in a dream for a single woman. The prominent researcher Muhammad Ibn Sirin gives the following interpretations about seeing lightning in a dream for an unmarried woman: It symbolizes in the dream the fear of God Almighty and the righteousness of the situation. It symbolizes the return of one of the individuals. His family from the trip, which brings happiness to her heart. The bright light in the sky caused by lightning and hearing its resonant voice symbolizes the approaching of a happy event in her life that she desires from a time that may be work or marriage. Lightning in a person’s dream has other meanings, which are having a strong character and endurance. Life's problems and difficult matters. Seeing lightning without rain or thunder with a feeling of anxiety and fear is a warning message about something or a decision that you accept to make and needs to reconsider. Lightning in a dream Al-Osaimi says the following interpretations regarding an unmarried woman who sees lightning in a dream: Lightning, when you see it A single woman without rain symbolizes fear, anxiety, and insecurity. It can indicate that she is threatened and threatened to harm an enemy or someone who wants to harm her. Lightning in a dream, when accompanied by rain, indicates achieving justice and victory over an unjust enemy. Interpretation of a dream about thunder for a single woman, although It is a common belief that seeing a woman with thunder in a dream is a bad omen and symbolizes the occurrence of a misfortune, but the vast majority of cases in which this dream appears appear to be good, which we will explain in detail in the following paragraph: Thunder laden with rain is a great joy entering her life and good news that Dreams will come true by God’s command. Hearing the sound of thunder while looking at the sky in a dream indicates the dreamer’s closeness to God Almighty and his willingness to avoid disobedience and committing sins. Hearing the sound of thunder without being accompanied by rain is a sign of the anxiety and fear that the lonely woman feels within herself. Here we have arrived at The conclusion of our article, in which we presented through its paragraphs all the details related to an unmarried woman seeing lightning in a dream and the good and bad connotations it brings. Just personal judgments that cannot be taken for granted, so you can be right or wrong and to interpret another dream you can access it through the live dream interpretation application.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a specific person’s name by senior scholars

preview.html: Interpreting a dream about the name of a specific person in a dream, and seeing the interpretation of the meanings of names is one of the very important visions that scholars have worked hard to interpret, as the interpretation is linked to the meaning of the name. And the clues and elements that revolve around it in the vision, so you have to look at it well, and we will tell you more about the meaning of a dream with the name of a specific person and what it symbolizes.Interpretation of a dream with the name of a specific personInterpreters of dream interpretations of the name of a specific person in a dream say that it is beneficial to the dreamer, if the name has good meanings or If it is one of the names of the prophets and companions, then here it symbolizes advancement and reaching a high position, God willing. If you dream of the name of a specific person that carries bad meanings, it is a problem or a clear defect in the fortuneteller, according to the interpretation of Sheikh Al-Nabulsi, who says that the name Etab expresses enmity or the name Ali. Symbolizes height. Ibn Sirin says: Interpreting a dream with the name of a specific person in a dream is evidence of blessing, goodness, and happiness if the name has good meanings, but if the name expresses bad meanings, it is an unpleasant vision. It expresses many problems in life. Seeing one of the most beautiful names of God in a person’s dream is evidence of patience and strength, in addition to the man’s ability to face life’s problems and difficulties, in addition to his being religious and his closeness to God Almighty. Interpretation of a dream with the name of a specific person for single people if a girl sees She is unmarried and someone calls her one of the most beautiful names. It is a vision that explains a lot of goodness, an increase in nutrition and the fulfillment of all her dreams and aspirations, in addition to it being one of the visions that indicate her hiding from God in this world and the hereafter. Seeing an unmarried girl someone calls her by the name Alia or Alia, It is a vision that expresses a high and elevated position in work or study, as it has a share in this name. An unmarried woman’s dream of repeating a specific name, such as Sabreen, is a symbol of patience and endurance. In the vision, it is good news of many good things for her, and God Almighty will compensate her greatly. Hearing The name of a specific person or its constant repetition in a person’s dream could be a psychological vision that carries many premonitions, especially if it is linked to this person as a result of thinking about him frequently. Interpretation of a dream about intercourse for a single woman by Imam Al-SadiqImam Al-Sadiq says that a dream about intercourse in a dream for an unmarried woman can It is a metaphor for a lot of thinking about such matters, especially if it is in the stage of adulthood. Ibn Sirin believes that intercourse in the dream of an unmarried girl is one of the happy visions, heralding the abundance of food and money and achieving goals in the world, and it may express marriage to someone of his status in the dream. Seeing an unmarried woman associating herself with a black man is a bad vision and indicates fears and difficulties in the girl’s life that she will not be able to overcome easily. Interpretation of a dream with the name of a specific person for a married woman: Imam Nabulsi believes that the appearance of the name Muhammad, Mahmoud, or Abdullah to a large extent in a married woman’s dream. It is an expression of luck and happiness in life and lasting satisfaction for the wife. If a married woman dreams of sex

The dream indicates success and the fulfillment of dreams, whether academic, professional, or emotional. If an unmarried woman sees a large snake or a snake near her, but she does not show her fear or the snake does not harm her or approach her. It is a good vision, and its connotations. Her great faith in God, her closeness to Him, and her distance from sins and desires, and God knows best. But if an unmarried woman sees in her dream that a large snake attacked her and was able to bite her and wound her in her body. It does not indicate evil and indicates the presence of a problem that you are suffering from, but it will be able to Find a solution for it and get rid of it. Seeing a large snake as a friend in a dream and facing it without fear or terror in one dream is bad because the vision indicates the presence of a friend or lover of the woman who is trying to hunt her, an untrustworthy person who claims that he loves her. But if the vision is of a large snake chasing An unmarried girl can escape from it. This indicates that she always turns to God and her closeness to Him, and it may be a sign from God Almighty that he accepts her call in a matter. title: Interpretation of a dream about shooting in the air by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about shooting in the air Recently, the spread of violence and the frequent wars have led to the appearance of weapons in our dreams, such as a pistol or a machine gun, and the sounds of gunshots can be heard poignantly, which has led many to seek the opinions of scholars on interpretation. The dream of shooting in the air, and who it was based on the social status of the fortuneteller, and whether he is male or female. Interpretation of the dream of shooting in the air by Ibn Sirin What is the interpretation of the dream of shooting in the air? When a person carries a gun alone and shoots in the air in a dream without the help of others, This is evidence of a strong personality, a distinguished position among people, and a high degree of wisdom and intelligence. Seeing someone shooting and intentionally harming others means that the viewer will be exposed to envy, the evil eye, and hatred from those around him in real life. If a man wounds his wife while shooting in the air, this is a bad sign for the continuation of Disagreement between spouses and there is a possibility of divorce. In the event that one sees himself carrying a gun and starts shooting, but the gun is snatched from his hand, this indicates irresponsibility, failure to make fatal decisions and failure to use opportunities properly, which leads to loss and loss. Hope. Anyone who dreams of shooting in a crowded place is a sign of low prices and a comfortable life. Interpretation of a dream about shooting in the air by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin says about the interpretation of seeing a sick person shooting in the countryside without harming anyone, that it indicates recovery from diseases and the disappearance of ills, but In the dream of an expatriate, it is a sign of an imminent return. Home. The dream also indicates an alleviation of anxiety and a change of circumstances for the better for those who are already worried and feeling upset. A bullet wound when the shot occurs indicates a break in the situation and a loss of money, or a sign of deteriorating health and poor physical fitness. If the bullet comes in the noon area during the shooting Fire in the countryside, this is a sign of treachery, deception and treachery that the dreamer will face at the hands of those close to him. You have a confused dream, what are you waiting for? Search on Google, the Egyptian Dream Interpretation Site. Interpretation of a dream about shooting in the air for single women. Seeing a dream about shooting in the air for single women indicates inappropriate behavior, meeting bad friends and walking with them on a forbidden path. As for dreaming about carrying weapons and discharging bullets into the air in front of people, it means It symbolizes the large number of enemies and the intensity of anger and hatred that emanates from them. If a girl sees herself injured by a bullet, this indicates that she is going through a major crisis or that she is exposed to a bad reputation that causes her psychological pain and great sadness. If the injury occurred in the back, this is evidence of spending money on unnecessary things. Hearing the sound of a gunshot in a girl’s dream is good news for reaping the fruits of success, the result of every effort and endurance of hardship until she achieves her goal. Interpretation of a dream about shooting in the air for a married womanAny person who sees himself Being shot in the street during a dream is an undesirable sign that she will face some disputes with neighbors or colleagues. title: Interpretation of a dream about a complete car, correct interpretations

preview.html: In the article below, we explain what is the interpretation of a car dream. According to what scholars and lawyers indicate in the interpretation of dreams, the sleeper can see in his dream that he is buying a new car or sees himself driving it and wants to know what the interpretation of this vision is, and whether it has a specific meaning. Meaning, or are they just thoughts from his subconscious mind and the most hateful dreams that have no meaning, so he resorts to jurists to explain his vision, and interpretation scholars say that this vision is interpreted in two ways, the first. title: Interpretation of dreams about cats in the toilet by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about cats in the toilet indicates many clues related to the dreamer’s life, depending on the events of the dream. There are those who dream of black cats in the toilet, or cats in a dream can be of different colors, and there are those who dream that the cat died or that they are trying to get rid of it and keep it away from their home. Interpretation of a dream about cats in the toilet. A dream about cats in the bathroom may indicate that there are many people close to the dreamer and he must be careful in dealing with them in order to give each person his fate. Cats sleeping in the toilet may warn the dreamer that he will be harmed and that he should pay more attention to himself. And to pray to God Almighty often to avoid deception and deception. Seeing cats in the bathroom in a dream can symbolize loss and loss, so the dreamer must protect his possessions more than before and ask God to protect him from harm. To dream of predatory cats in the toilet can warn of enemies. And that the dreamer must work hard to be able to get rid of them as quickly as possible with the help of God Almighty. Interpretation of dreams about cats in the toilet by Ibn Sirin. A dream about cats in the toilet by the scholar Ibn Sirin can indicate different meanings depending on the condition of the cats. For example, if a person sees that cats are attacking him in the bathroom. This may indicate the presence of pursuers in the dreamer. And they are trying to harm him and his reputation, and therefore he must remember God Almighty and try to get rid of his enemies. As for the dream of black cats in the bathroom, it may warn of stumbling, and that the fortuneteller must be strong and steadfast in order to reach safety, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about cats in the toilet for unmarried women. Cats sleeping in the bathroom for a single girl could be a warning that there is a bad person near her. And that he is trying to deceive her, but she must be vigilant and not allow anyone to harm her. He must remember God Almighty and pray to him to protect him from distress, or perhaps dreaming cats in the bathroom indicates the test that the dreamer may go through, but he will start again with the will of the Most Merciful, so he does not. You have to lose hope and keep trying. As for the dream of a black cat in the bathroom, it can indicate loss and imminent loss and that the dreamer must have the strength to get through the difficult period, and as for the dream of predatory cats in the bathroom, it can symbolize the dreamer’s enemies. It is necessary to avoid them as much as possible, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about cats in the toilet for a married woman. Seeing cats in the toilet for a married woman could be evidence of problems and disagreements between her and her husband, and she must try to get rid of them as quickly as possible and pray to God Almighty for stability and happiness or for the cats to sleep. In the bathroom, it may symbolize the difficulties that the dreamer faces in his life and that she has to work hard and diligently and not lose hope until she overcomes the pain and returns to peace again. Sometimes, a dream of cats in the bathroom can warn of financial problems. And God Almighty knows best. title: Interpretation of ice cream in a white dream

preview.html: We present to you, dear reader, the interpretation of ice cream in a dream through the following article through the Encyclopedia of Dream Interpretation Scholars, including the great scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin. It is also known as ice cream or soft drinks, and it is a dessert that no one likes and prefers to eat, especially in the extremely hot summer seasons, as it reduces It reduces the feeling of heat and thirst and gives the body a feeling of vitality. Healing... is like the state of social and psychological scenes. Interpretation of ice cream in a dream. Ibn Sirin says about seeing this dream the following connotations: Eating fresh ice cream indicates that the dreamer will succeed in achieving the goal that he has been striving for for a long time. Rotten and not new symbolizes failure to move forward. Moving forward towards the future and failing to achieve goals may indicate the beginning of calamity and distress, God forbid. Seeing a child eating ice cream means that the dreamer will witness happy events that may be related to personal life or work. Seeing large amounts of ice cream indicates that the dreamer is a person of good fortune. Before him, all difficulties and obstacles will be overcome. In a single person’s dream, it indicates marriage in the coming period, and in this marriage there will be stability and satisfaction with God’s will. Giving it between spouses is a sign of the extent of love that binds them. Ice cream in Al-Osaimi’s dream. Rotten ice cream that failed in Managing business or life affairs. A lady buying ice cream for a child symbolizes pregnancy soon. Al-Osaimi says that fresh and delicious ice cream represents a lot of money on its way to the fortuneteller. The melted ice cream that the dreamer eats is a decision he made and remembered before implementing it. Strawberry ice cream symbolizes The kind words and morals that the viewer enjoys and adheres to. Interpretation of a dream about white ice cream. It is one of the most common dreams that indicate the dreamer’s happiness and the goodness that will come to him in the coming days. It symbolizes the purity of the dreamer’s intention, the nobility of his heart, and his moral and religious commitment. It shows the person who buys ice cream White for someone else really knows how strong the feelings they have or have towards this person. Interpretation of a dream about chocolate ice cream: Eating it for a sick person indicates a complete and quick recovery. This dream symbolizes that the dreamer will spend the next period of his life with overwhelming pleasure as a result of achieving all his dreams and desires. In a dream For a married woman, it shows the stability she lives at home with her husband and children, and the husband’s gift of chocolate ice cream to his wife is a sign of pregnancy with a male child. Interpretation of seeing ice cream in a dream for a single woman When a single woman sees ice cream in a dream, its meaning appears as follows: Seeing that she bought it for him and got engaged is not promising because it indicates the possibility of her engagement ending. Spoiled ice cream is sadness and trouble for the coming season, and God knows best. Buying ice cream for children shows her willingness to please those around her and her good heart. Seeing ice cream without buying it symbolizes an upcoming marriage in The status of the engagement, and if it is not, then this is good news for the engagement.Interpretation of ice cream in a dream for

title: Interpretation of lightning in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: In the following article, the Encyclopedia presents to you the interpretation of lightning in a dream for a single woman, which is one of the natural visual phenomena that when it occurs takes the form of a large electrical spark in the sky. Thunder roared in terror. An unmarried woman may see lightning during her sleep and wake up frightened, and would like to find an explanation for what she saw in a dream, because it may carry for her a message from God Almighty related to something in her life and whether the connotation is good or not. This topic, including Ibn Sirin and Al-Usaimi, we present to you the following paragraphs. Interpretation of lightning in a dream for a single woman. The prominent researcher Muhammad Ibn Sirin gives the following interpretations about seeing lightning in a dream for an unmarried woman: It symbolizes in the dream the fear of God Almighty and the righteousness of the situation. It symbolizes the return of one of the individuals. His family from the trip, which brings happiness to her heart. The bright light in the sky caused by lightning and hearing its resonant voice symbolizes the approaching of a happy event in her life that she desires from a time that may be work or marriage. Lightning in a person’s dream has other meanings, which are having a strong character and endurance. Life's problems and difficult matters. Seeing lightning without rain or thunder with a feeling of anxiety and fear is a warning message about something or a decision that you accept to make and needs to reconsider. Lightning in a dream Al-Osaimi says the following interpretations regarding an unmarried woman who sees lightning in a dream: Lightning, when you see it A single woman without rain symbolizes fear, anxiety, and insecurity. When a person carries a gun alone and shoots in the air in a dream without the help of others, This is evidence of a strong personality, a distinguished position among people, and a high degree of wisdom and intelligence. Seeing someone shooting and intentionally harming others means that the viewer will be exposed to envy, the evil eye, and hatred from those around him in real life. If a man wounds his wife while shooting in the air, this is a bad sign for the continuation of Disagreement between spouses and there is a possibility of divorce. If one sees himself holding a gun and starts shooting, but the gun is snatched from his hand, this indicates irresponsibility, failure to make fatal decisions and failure to use opportunities properly, which leads to loss and loss. Home. The dream also indicates an alleviation of anxiety and a change of circumstances for the better for those who are already worried and feeling upset. title: Interpretation of dreams about cats in the toilet by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about cats in the toilet indicates many clues related to the dreamer’s life, depending on the events of the dream. There are those who dream of black cats in the toilet, or cats in a dream can be of different colors, and there are those who dream that the cat died or that they are trying to get rid of it and keep it away from their home. Interpretation of a dream about cats in the toilet. A dream about cats in the bathroom may indicate that there are many people close to the dreamer and he must be careful in dealing with them in order to give each person his fate. Cats sleeping in the toilet may warn the dreamer that he will be harmed and that he should pay more attention to himself. And to pray to God Almighty often to avoid deception and deception. Seeing cats in the bathroom in a dream can symbolize loss and loss, so the dreamer must protect his possessions more than before and ask God to protect him from harm. To dream of predatory cats in the toilet can warn of enemies. And that the dreamer must work hard to be able to get rid of them as quickly as possible with the help of God Almighty. Interpretation of dreams about cats in the toilet by Ibn Sirin. A dream about cats in the toilet by the scholar Ibn Sirin can indicate different meanings depending on the condition of the cats. For example, if a person sees that cats are attacking him in the bathroom. This may indicate the presence of pursuers in the dreamer. And they are trying to harm him and his reputation, and therefore he must remember God Almighty and try to get rid of his enemies. As for the dream of black cats in the bathroom, it may warn of stumbling, and that the fortuneteller must be strong and steadfast in order to reach safety, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about cats in the toilet for unmarried women. Cats sleeping in the bathroom for a single girl could be a warning that there is a bad person near her. And that he is trying to deceive her, but she must be vigilant and not allow anyone to harm her. He must remember God Almighty and pray to him to protect him from distress, or perhaps dreaming cats in the bathroom indicates the test that the dreamer may go through, but he will start again with the will of the Most Merciful, so he does not. You have to lose hope and keep trying. As for the dream of a black cat in the bathroom, it can indicate loss and imminent loss and that the dreamer must have the strength to get through the difficult period, and as for the dream of predatory cats in the bathroom, it can symbolize the dreamer’s enemies. It is necessary to avoid them as much as possible, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about cats in the toilet for a married woman. Seeing cats in the toilet for a married woman could be evidence of problems and disagreements between her and her husband, and she must try to get rid of them as quickly as possible and pray to God Almighty for stability and happiness or for the cats to sleep. In the bathroom, it may symbolize the difficulties that the dreamer faces in his life and that she has to work hard and diligently and not lose hope until she overcomes the pain and returns to peace again. Sometimes, a dream of cats in the bathroom can warn of financial problems. And God Almighty knows best. title: Interpretation of ice cream in a white dream

preview.html: We present to you, dear reader, the interpretation of ice cream in a dream through the following article through the Encyclopedia of Dream Interpretation Scholars, including the great scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin. It is also known as ice cream or soft drinks, and it is a dessert that no one likes and prefers to eat, especially in the extremely hot summer seasons, as it reduces It reduces the feeling of heat and thirst and gives the body a feeling of vitality. Healing... is like the state of social and psychological scenes. Interpretation of ice cream in a dream. Ibn Sirin says about seeing this dream the following connotations: Eating fresh ice cream indicates that the dreamer will succeed in achieving the goal that he has been striving for for a long time. Rotten and not new symbolizes failure to move forward. Moving forward towards the future and failing to achieve goals may indicate the beginning of calamity and distress, God forbid. Seeing a child eating ice cream means that the dreamer will witness happy events that may be related to personal life or work. Seeing large amounts of ice cream indicates that the dreamer is a person of good fortune. Before him, all difficulties and obstacles will be overcome. In a single person’s dream, it indicates marriage in the coming period, and in this marriage there will be stability and satisfaction with God’s will. Giving it between spouses is a sign of the extent of love that binds them. Ice cream in Al-Osaimi’s dream. Rotten ice cream that failed in Managing business or life affairs. A lady buying ice cream for a child symbolizes pregnancy soon. Al-Osaimi says that fresh and delicious ice cream represents a lot of money on its way to the fortuneteller. The melted ice cream that the dreamer eats is a decision he made and remembered before implementing it. Strawberry ice cream symbolizes The kind words and morals that the viewer enjoys and adheres to. Interpretation of a dream about white ice cream. It is one of the most common dreams that indicate the dreamer’s happiness and the goodness that will come to him in the coming days. It symbolizes the purity of the dreamer’s intention, the nobility of his heart, and his moral and religious commitment. It shows the person who buys ice cream White for someone else really knows how strong the feelings they have or have towards this person. Interpretation of a dream about chocolate ice cream: Eating it for a sick person indicates a complete and quick recovery. This dream symbolizes that the dreamer will spend the next period of his life with overwhelming pleasure as a result of achieving all his dreams and desires. In a dream A married woman shows the stability she lives at home with her husband and children, and the husband’s gift of chocolate ice cream to his wife is a sign of pregnancy with a male child. Interpretation of seeing ice cream in a dream for a single woman When a single woman sees ice cream in a dream, its meaning appears as follows: Seeing that she bought it for him and got engaged is not promising because it indicates the possibility of her engagement ending. Spoiled ice cream is sadness and trouble for the coming season, and God knows best. Buying ice cream for children shows her willingness to please those around her and her good heart. Seeing ice cream without buying it symbolizes an upcoming marriage in The status of the engagement, and if it is not, then this is good news for the engagement.Interpretation of ice cream in a dream for

title: Wolves in a dream

preview.html: It also indicates the worst enemies and is a warning vision for the dreamer to pay attention to those around him, especially those who show him kindness and love. Interpretation of seeing wolves in a dream for a single girl: A wolf in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates a man in reality, and if an unmarried woman sees a wolf chasing her in a dream. It indicates the presence of a person who is actually pursuing his mistress in a dream and has the intention of marrying her or marrying her, and God knows best. Seeing a wolf in an unmarried woman’s dream symbolizes the proposal of a person in a high position to marry her, but he is cunning. Seeing a wolf for a girl could be a sign of A warning to take care of her from a treacherous person trying to get close to her. If the girl is engaged and sees a wolf in her dream, this means that her fiancé’s feelings for her are not real, and God knows best. Fighting with a wolf and being able to kill it indicates the dreamer’s ability to find solutions to her problems on her own. Seeing him playing Or taming a wolf, means that no obstacle will stand before him, or that one will change for the better in her hand. Attacking a wolf and escaping from it in a dream for an unmarried woman, indicates the end of the difficulties and obstacles that burden her in life. If a single woman sees a white wolf, this is a sign However, she is following her heart and this will expose her to exploitation by others. In addition to the wolf, it comes as a symbol of problems, crises, and a feeling of fear and anxiety, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. The fear of hearing the howling of a wolf in a girl’s dream indicates that she is close to bad friends. Seeing a wolf for a woman may indicate betrayal or betrayal of her husband, who has the characteristics of a wolf in reality. If a woman is working and she sees A wolf in her dream, this is a sign that her colleague or partner deceived her at work. But if a woman sees a wolf chasing her, this indicates that she is hiding a secret that is dangerous to people and it could be a great sin. Seeing fighting with a wolf and killing it in a dream for a married woman means victory over her haters And envy. If a woman succeeds in expelling a wolf from her home, this foretells that problems and disputes between her and her husband will be resolved. For a wife to see a wolf in a dream and be afraid of it, means that her husband will gain a prominent position among the people, and God knows best. If a woman sees that a wolf attacked her son And save him, this indicates that the woman saved her son from a calamity that will befall her. If a wolf wakes up some unmarried woman in a dream, this is a warning of forbidden money coming from illegal means, and God knows best. If a married woman sees that she is raising a wolf, this means that she is raising a newborn child. From a forbidden relationship. Seeing a wolf in a married woman’s dream may mean that the presence of a lover in her life will lead to her divorcing him and not marrying him. If the wolf is black in color in a woman’s dream, this means that she heard the beautiful words of a deceitful and hypocritical man. Read also: A wolf dreams of attacking Women A
